title: Cupids reuenge As it hath beene diuers times acted by the Children of her Maiesties Reuels. By Iohn Fletcher
author: Beaumont, Francis, 1584-1616.
publisher: Printed by Thomas Creede for Iosias Harison, and are to bee solde at the Golden Anker in Pater-Noster-Row,
notes: In fact written in collaboration with Francis Beaumont.
Reproduction of the original inthe Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
